title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 169: Featuring Byron Dafoe
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL goaltender Byron Dafoe. Byron joins to talk about his time in Boston, playing with Gretzky in LA, playing in Russia and more. The boys also break down the remaining playoff series one by one and discuss who they think will advance. Stevie Y made his return to Detroit this week so the guys broke that down as well along with Grinnelli and Whit's Rough N' Rowdy bet.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
